items.sentence: They want a few more hours to finish the report.
I\'m not sure that I\'m going to Tom\'s wedding.
Tom wrote something on the back of the envelope.
Tom yanked open the drawer and grabbed a pencil.
Tom took off his clothes and put on his pajamas.
Tom must be well off. He drives a very nice car.
Tom nearly died of yellow fever a few years ago.
It\'s been three years since Tom came to Boston.
It\'s going to take me a while to get this done.
It\'s hard to believe that it actually happened.
